reviews.review_msg: AWSOME PROF!! best psyc prof ever. Even though lecture was a bit boring, but the material was really interesting. The prof is also very helpful and encourages questions. i would definitely take this course, and its a GPA booster!

If you ike lowering our GPA for some reason if you like wasting your money take a class with Dr. Turnbull. He's boring and unhelpful. His exams are difficult and questions are incomprehensible. I seriously think he should be banned from teaching or at least this useless, irrelavant course should not be taught at all. AVOID AVOID AVOID

Dr. Hart is probably one of the best proffessors one could have in their whole university experience. He's funny, very well knowleged, and very very helpful. He is always available for help and he really does whatever he can to help his students. His lectures are interesting and his exams are fair.
She is very interesting, passionate and humorous.
